Held
:   Holder cannot be placed in the PC.  Any move attempting to remove this item from the holder will fail.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lets a Trainer write a message and send it via Pokémon trade.

Held

Each Pokémon earns experience as though it had battled alone, divided by the number of Pokémon in its group, then divided by the number of groups. Pokémon holding this item who also participated in battle effectively earn experience twice.

    Fainted Pokémon never earn experience, and empty groups are
ignored; thus, if a single Pokémon is holding this item and the only Pokémon who battled faints from explosion, the holder will gain full experience.

Held: Increases the holder’s Special Attack by 50%, but restricts it to the first move it uses until it leaves battle or loses this item.  If this item is swapped for another Choice item via Trick or Switcheroo, the holder’s restriction is still lifted, but it will again be restricted to the next move it uses.
(Quirk: If the holder is switched in by U-Turn and it also knows U-Turn, U-Turn becomes its restricted move.)
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Increases Special Attack by 50%, but restricts the holder to only one move.

flavor_text_entries:

allow only one kind of move to be used.

name: full-incense

effect_entries.effect: Held: The holder will go last within its move’s priority bracket, regardless of Speed.  If multiple Pokémon within the same priority bracket are subject to this effect, the slower Pokémon will go first.  The holder will move after Pokémon with Stall.  If the holder has Stall, Stall is ignored.  This item ignores Trick Room.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder moves last in its priority bracket. Breeding: Snorlax begets a Munchlax Egg.

certain Pokémon, it will increase all their stats at once.

name: endorsement
flavor_text_entries:
A letter of recommendation that you’ll need in order to
participate in the Gym Challenge.

name: pokemon-box-link
flavor_text_entries:
A device that allows you to access the Pokémon storage
system. There are some places where it won’t work.

name: wishing-star
flavor_text_entries:
A stone found in the Galar region with a mysterious power.
It’s said that your dreams come true if you find one.

name: dynamax-band
flavor_text_entries:
A Wishing Star has been affixed to it. It lets out a light
that allows Pokémon to Dynamax when at a Power Spot.

name: fishing-rod--galar
flavor_text_entries: Use it by the water to fish up various kinds of Pokémon.

name: rotom-bike
flavor_text_entries:
This bike can be combined with the Pokémon Rotom to
use a turbo boost.

name: sausages
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. These sausages should be
boiled before eating.

name: bobs-food-tin
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. The tinned food that Bob sells
is curiously popular in Galar.

name: bachs-food-tin
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. The tinned food that Bach sells
is curiously popular in Galar.

name: tin-of-beans
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. When simmered, the beans
suffuse a dish with their mild flavor.

name: bread
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. An indispensable tool for
mopping up that extra curry left on your plate.

name: pasta
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. These flour noodles make
for a surprisingly good match with curry.

name: mixed-mushrooms
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. The chewy texture of the
mushrooms transforms any dish they’re added to.

name: smoke-poke-tail
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. When a Slowpoke’s tail falls off,
it grows back quickly.

name: large-leek
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. Whether this is the kind of
vegetable stalk that Farfetch’d like is unknown.

name: fancy-apple
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. An apple chosen above others.
It has spectacular form and a brilliant sheen.

name: brittle-bones
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. The taste boiled off from the
bones is sure to give a dish a light umami taste.

name: pack-of-potatoes
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. Potatoes help mellow out a spicy
taste, to make a dish more mild.

name: pungent-root
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. Though carelessly picked, these
herbs can add a fragrant accent to a dish.

name: salad-mix
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. The assortment of vegetables
looks quite appealing and healthy.

name: fried-food
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. It’s been a while since it was
fried, so it’s gotten greasy.

name: boiled-egg
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. Even just one boiled egg can
really enhance a dish.

name: camping-gear
flavor_text_entries:
Everything you need to set up a tent and get cooking in
a Wild Area or at a camping spot.

name: rusted-sword
flavor_text_entries:
It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a terrible
disaster in ancient times. But it’s grown rusty and worn.

name: rusted-shield
flavor_text_entries:
It is said that a hero used this shield to halt a terrible
disaster in ancient times. But it’s grown rusty and worn.

name: fossilized-bird
flavor_text_entries:
The fossil of an ancient Pokémon that once soared
through the sky. What it looked like is a mystery.

name: fossilized-fish
flavor_text_entries:
The fossil of an ancient Pokémon that once lived in the
sea. What it looked like is a mystery.

name: fossilized-drake
flavor_text_entries:
The fossil of an ancient Pokémon that once roamed the
land. What it looked like is a mystery.

name: fossilized-dino
flavor_text_entries:
The fossil of an ancient Pokémon that once lived in the
sea. What it looked like is a mystery.

name: strawberry-sweet
flavor_text_entries:
A strawberry-shaped sweet. When a Milcery
holds this, it will spin around happily.

name: love-sweet
flavor_text_entries:
A heart-shaped sweet. When a Milcery
holds this, it spins around happily.

name: berry-sweet
flavor_text_entries:
A berry-shaped sweet. When a Milcery
holds this, it spins around happily.

name: clover-sweet
flavor_text_entries:
A clover-shaped sweet. When a Milcery
holds this, it spins around happily.

name: flower-sweet
flavor_text_entries:
A flower-shaped sweet. When a Milcery
holds this, it spins around happily.

name: star-sweet
flavor_text_entries:
A star-shaped sweet. When a Milcery
holds this, it spins around happily.

name: ribbon-sweet
flavor_text_entries:
A ribbon-shaped sweet. When a Milcery
holds this, it spins around happily.

name: sweet-apple
flavor_text_entries:
A peculiar apple that can make a certain species of
Pokémon evolve. It’s exceptionally sweet.

name: tart-apple
flavor_text_entries:
A peculiar apple that can make a certain species of
Pokémon evolve. It’s exceptionally tart.

name: throat-spray
flavor_text_entries:
Raises Sp. Atk when a Pokémon uses a sound-based
move.

name: eject-pack
flavor_text_entries:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder’s
stats are lowered, it will be switched out of battle.

name: heavy-duty-boots
flavor_text_entries:
These boots prevent the effects of traps set on
the battlefield.

name: blunder-policy
flavor_text_entries:
Raises Speed sharply when a Pokémon misses with a
move because of accuracy.

name: room-service
flavor_text_entries:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. Lowers Speed when
Trick Room takes effect.

name: utility-umbrella
flavor_text_entries:
An item to be held by a Pokémon. This sturdy umbrella
protects the holder from the effects of rain and
harsh sunlight.

name: exp-candy-xs
flavor_text_entries:
A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it
will grant a single Pokémon a very small amount of
Exp. Points.

name: exp-candy-s
flavor_text_entries:
A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it
will grant a single Pokémon a small amount of
Exp. Points.

name: exp-candy-m
flavor_text_entries:
A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it
will grant a single Pokémon a moderate amount of
Exp. Points.

name: exp-candy-l
flavor_text_entries:
A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it
will grant a single Pokémon a large amount of
Exp. Points.

name: exp-candy-xl
flavor_text_entries:
A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it
will grant a single Pokémon a very large amount of
Exp. Points.

name: dynamax-candy
flavor_text_entries:
A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it
will raise the Dynamax Level of a single Pokémon by
one. A higher level means higher HP when Dynamaxed.

name: tr00
flavor_text_entries:
A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit.
This sharply raises the user’s Attack stat.

name: tr01
flavor_text_entries:
The user drops onto the target with its full body
weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: tr02
flavor_text_entries:
The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.
This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: tr03
flavor_text_entries:
The target is blasted by a huge volume of water
launched under great pressure.

name: tr04
flavor_text_entries:
The user attacks everything around it by swamping
its surroundings with a giant wave.

name: tr05
flavor_text_entries:
The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy.
This may also leave the target frozen.

name: tr06
flavor_text_entries:
A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing
Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing
Pokémon frozen.

name: tr07
flavor_text_entries:
A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over.
The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: tr08
flavor_text_entries:
A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: tr09
flavor_text_entries:
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to
inflict damage. This may also leave the target
with paralysis.

name: tr10
flavor_text_entries:
The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every
Pokémon around it.

name: tr11
flavor_text_entries:
The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: tr12
flavor_text_entries:
The user relaxes and lightens its body to move
faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

name: tr13
flavor_text_entries:
The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that
critical hits land more easily.

name: tr14
flavor_text_entries:
The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain
into randomly using nearly any move.

name: tr15
flavor_text_entries:
The target is attacked with an intense blast of
all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target
with a burn.

name: tr16
flavor_text_entries:
The user charges at the target and may make
it flinch.

name: tr17
flavor_text_entries:
The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its
concerns. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

name: tr18
flavor_text_entries:
The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is
restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: tr19
flavor_text_entries:
The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack.
This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

name: tr20
flavor_text_entries:
The user creates a substitute for itself using some of
its HP. The substitute serves as the user’s decoy.

name: tr21
flavor_text_entries:
An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the
less HP the user has.

name: tr22
flavor_text_entries:
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may
also poison the target.

name: tr23
flavor_text_entries:
The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing
team’s feet. The trap hurts Pokémon that switch
into battle.

name: tr24
flavor_text_entries:
The user rampages and attacks for two to three
turns. The user then becomes confused.

name: tr25
flavor_text_entries:
The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack
the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: tr26
flavor_text_entries:
The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

name: tr27
flavor_text_entries:
While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the
moves it knows.

name: tr28
flavor_text_entries:
Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams
into the target with no letup.

name: tr29
flavor_text_entries:
The user switches places with a party Pokémon in
waiting and passes along any stat changes.

name: tr30
flavor_text_entries:
The user compels the target to keep using the move
it encored for three turns.

name: tr31
flavor_text_entries:
The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail.
This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: tr32
flavor_text_entries:
The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs.
This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: tr33
flavor_text_entries:
The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: tr34
flavor_text_entries:
Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic
energy attacks the target.

name: tr35
flavor_text_entries:
The user attacks in an uproar for three turns.
During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

name: tr36
flavor_text_entries:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on opposing
Pokémon. This may also leave those Pokémon with
a burn.

name: tr37
flavor_text_entries:
The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use
only attack moves for three turns.

name: tr38
flavor_text_entries:
The user catches the target off guard and swaps its
held item with its own.

name: tr39
flavor_text_entries:
The user attacks the target with great power.
However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and
Defense stats.

name: tr40
flavor_text_entries:
The user employs its psychic power to exchange
Abilities with the target.

name: tr41
flavor_text_entries:
The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit
more easily. This may also leave the target with
a burn.

name: tr42
flavor_text_entries:
The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with
the power to inflict damage.

name: tr43
flavor_text_entries:
The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s
recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: tr44
flavor_text_entries:
The user absorbs a mystical power from space to
raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: tr45
flavor_text_entries:
The user attacks by shooting muddy water at opposing
Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

name: tr46
flavor_text_entries:
The user hardens its body’s surface like iron,
sharply raising its Defense stat.

name: tr47
flavor_text_entries: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

name: tr48
flavor_text_entries:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body,
raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

name: tr49
flavor_text_entries:
The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its
spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name: tr50
flavor_text_entries:
The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and
attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land
more easily.

name: tr51
flavor_text_entries:
The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful
dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

name: tr52
flavor_text_entries:
The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin.
The slower the user compared to the target, the
greater the move’s power.

name: tr53
flavor_text_entries:
The user fights the target up close without guarding
itself. This also lowers the user’s Defense and
Sp. Def stats.

name: tr54
flavor_text_entries:
The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of
the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing
Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: tr55
flavor_text_entries:
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with a burn.

name: tr56
flavor_text_entries:
The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep
within its body at the target. This attack
never misses.

name: tr57
flavor_text_entries:
The target is stabbed with a tentacle, arm, or the like
steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

name: tr58
flavor_text_entries:
The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark
thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

name: tr59
flavor_text_entries:
The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds
down on the target from above.

name: tr60
flavor_text_entries:
The user slashes at the target by crossing its
scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

name: tr61
flavor_text_entries:
The user generates a damaging sound wave by
vibration. This may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: tr62
flavor_text_entries:
The target is attacked with a shock wave generated
by the user’s gaping mouth.

name: tr63
flavor_text_entries:
The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as
if it were made of gemstones.

name: tr64
flavor_text_entries:
The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes
its power. This may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: tr65
flavor_text_entries:
The user draws power from nature and fires it at the
target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: tr66
flavor_text_entries:
The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low
altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

name: tr67
flavor_text_entries:
The user makes the ground under the target erupt
with power. This may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: tr68
flavor_text_entries:
The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad
thoughts. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: tr69
flavor_text_entries:
The user focuses its willpower to its head and
attacks the target. This may also make the
target flinch.

name: tr70
flavor_text_entries:
The user gathers all its light energy and releases it
all at once. This may also lower the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

name: tr71
flavor_text_entries:
The user whips up a storm of leaves around the
target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.

name: tr72
flavor_text_entries:
The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the
like to harshly lash the target.

name: tr73
flavor_text_entries:
The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to
attack. This may also poison the target.

name: tr74
flavor_text_entries:
The user slams the target with its steel-hard head.
This may also make the target flinch.

name: tr75
flavor_text_entries:
The user stabs the target from below with
sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

name: tr76
flavor_text_entries:
The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the
opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon
that switch into battle.

name: tr77
flavor_text_entries:
The user snares the target with grass and trips it.
The heavier the target, the greater the
move’s power.

name: tr78
flavor_text_entries:
The user strikes everything around it by swamping
the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also
poison those hit.

name: tr79
flavor_text_entries:
The user slams into the target with its heavy body.
The more the user outweighs the target, the greater
the move’s power.

name: tr80
flavor_text_entries:
The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The
faster the user is than the target, the greater the
move’s power.

name: tr81
flavor_text_entries:
The user turns the target’s power against it.
The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater
the damage it deals.

name: tr82
flavor_text_entries:
The user attacks the target with stored power.
The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater
the move’s power.

name: tr83
flavor_text_entries:
The user teleports using a strange power and
switches places with one of its allies.

name: tr84
flavor_text_entries:
The user shoots boiling hot water at its target.
This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: tr85
flavor_text_entries:
The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk
stats increase.

name: tr86
flavor_text_entries:
The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes
into its target. This also damages the user a little.

name: tr87
flavor_text_entries:
The user crashes into its target while rotating its
body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

name: tr88
flavor_text_entries:
The user slams its target with its flame-covered
body. The more the user outweighs the target, the
greater the move’s power.

name: tr89
flavor_text_entries:
The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a
fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also
confuse the target.

name: tr90
flavor_text_entries:
The user plays rough with the target and attacks it.
This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

name: tr91
flavor_text_entries:
Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd
poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and
Speed stats of a poisoned target.

name: tr92
flavor_text_entries:
The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a
powerful flash.

name: tr93
flavor_text_entries:
The user swings both arms and hits the target.
The target’s stat changes don’t affect this
attack’s damage.

name: tr94
flavor_text_entries:
The user fiercely attacks the target using its
entire body.

name: tr95
flavor_text_entries:
The user attacks the target’s throat, and the
resultant suffering prevents the target from using
moves that emit sound for two turns.

name: tr96
flavor_text_entries:
The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that
explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a
pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

name: tr97
flavor_text_entries:
The user bites the target with its psychic
capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen
and Reflect.

name: tr98
flavor_text_entries:
The user slams into the target using a full-force
blast of water. This may also lower the target’s
Defense stat.

name: tr99
flavor_text_entries:
The user attacks by slamming its body into the target.
The higher the user’s Defense, the more damage it can
inflict on the target.

name: tm00
flavor_text_entries:
The target is slugged by a punch thrown with
muscle-packed power.

name: lonely-mint
flavor_text_entries:
When a Pokémon smells this mint, its Attack will grow
more easily, but its Defense will grow more slowly.

name: serious-mint

name: wishing-piece
flavor_text_entries:
Throw one into a Pokémon Den to attract
a wild Dynamax Pokémon.

name: cracked-pot
flavor_text_entries:
A peculiar teapot that can make a certain species of
Pokémon evolve. It may be cracked, but tea poured
from it is delicious.

name: chipped-pot
flavor_text_entries:
A peculiar teapot that can make a certain species of
Pokémon evolve. It may be chipped, but tea poured
from it is delicious.

name: hi-tech-earbuds
flavor_text_entries:
Strange earbuds that allow you to freely control the
volume of various sounds.

name: fruit-bunch
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. The syrupy fruits give off a strong
tropical feel.

name: moomoo-cheese
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. Melted cheese can really give a
curry some richness.

name: spice-mix
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. There are over fifty spices
contained within this ingredient’s hot flavor.

name: fresh-cream
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. Add some whipped cream to a
spicy curry to give it some sweetness.

name: packaged-curry
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. Using packaged curry helps
make sure there are no slipups when cooking.

name: coconut-milk
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. The refined sweetness of this
coconut milk makes it quite popular.

name: instant-noodles
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. It has a junk-food sort of taste,
but it goes well with curry.

name: precooked-burger
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. If you’re unsure about what to
cook, you can’t go wrong with some burger.

name: gigantamix
flavor_text_entries:
One of the many ingredients that can be used for
cooking at your camp. A mysterious spice. Even a tiny
sprinkle is sure to make a curry gigantic.

name: wishing-chip
flavor_text_entries:
Toss a number of them into a Pokémon Den for the
chance to attract a wild Dynamax Pokémon.

name: rotom-bike--water-mode
flavor_text_entries:
This bike can be combined with the Pokémon Rotom to
not only do a turbo boost but also run on the water.

name: catching-charm
flavor_text_entries:
Holding it is said to increase the chance of getting a
critical catch. Curiously, the charm doesn’t shake much.

name: old-letter
flavor_text_entries:
A letter entrusted to you by a girl, to be delivered to
a boy. Strangely, it looks old to you.

name: band-autograph
flavor_text_entries:
It’s signed by all members of the Galar region’s most
charismatic band, the Maximizers.

name: sonias-book
flavor_text_entries:
Professor Sonia’s published writings. Her new
discoveries about the Galar region’s legends are
recorded in this enjoyable read.

name: rotom-catalog
flavor_text_entries:
A catalog of devices that Rotom like. Use the catalog
to have Rotom hop in and out of the various devices
listed within.

name: max-honey
flavor_text_entries:
Honey that Dynamax Vespiquen produces. Adding this
honey to Max Soup makes the taste very smooth. It also
has the same effect as a Max Revive.

name: max-mushrooms
flavor_text_entries:
Mushrooms that have the power of changing Dynamax
forms. They boost all stats of a Pokémon during battle.

name: galarica-twig
flavor_text_entries:
A twig from a species of tree called Galarica that grows
in certain areas around the Galar region. It’s a material
for an accessory for a certain Pokémon.

name: galarica-cuff
flavor_text_entries:
A cuff made from woven-together Galarica Twigs.
Giving it to Galarian Slowpoke makes the
Pokémon very happy.

name: style-card
flavor_text_entries:
A card that increases the selection in boutiques and
hair salons.

name: armor-pass
flavor_text_entries:
A pass to go to the Isle of Armor. Show it to the rail
staff at Wedgehurst Station.

name: rotom-bike--sparkling-white
flavor_text_entries:
This bike can do a turbo boost and run on the water
using Rotom’s power. It’s a sparkling white that
shines brilliantly.

name: rotom-bike--glistening-black
flavor_text_entries:
This bike can do a turbo boost and run on the water
using Rotom’s power. It’s a glistening black that
shines reddish-black.

name: exp-charm
flavor_text_entries:
A charm that increases the Exp. Points that Pokémon
can get. A machine-like object is inside the charm.

name: armorite-ore
flavor_text_entries:
Rare ore that can be obtained on the Isle of Armor.
Something good will happen if you give it to a collector
on the Isle of Armor.

name: mark-charm
flavor_text_entries:
A mysterious and unique charm that increases the
chance of finding a Pokémon with a mark.

name: reins-of-unity--merge
flavor_text_entries:
Reins that people presented to the king. They enhance
Calyrex’s power over bountiful harvests and unite
Calyrex with its beloved steed.

name: reins-of-unity--split
flavor_text_entries:
Reins that people presented to the king. They enable
those who are connected to communicate with each
other. The reins separate Calyrex and its beloved steed.

name: galarica-wreath
flavor_text_entries:
A wreath made from woven-together Galarica Twigs.
Placing it on the head of a Galarian Slowpoke makes
the Pokémon very happy.

name: legendary-clue-1
flavor_text_entries:
A clue about the King of Bountiful Harvests. It’s written
by Peony, and an old photo is attached to it.

name: legendary-clue-2
flavor_text_entries:
A clue about the legend of giants. It’s written
by Peony and has unique drawings.

name: legendary-clue-3
flavor_text_entries:
A clue about the legend of bird Pokémon. It’s written
by Peony and has a unique drawing.

name: legendary-clue-question
flavor_text_entries:
A mysterious clue that Peony seems to have dropped.
There’s a photo attached to it showing a shining hole
opening above the Max Lair.

name: crown-pass
flavor_text_entries:
A pass to go to the Crown Tundra. Show it to the rail
staff at Wedgehurst Station.

name: wooden-crown
flavor_text_entries:
A mysterious object made of wood. Part of it seems to
be chipped. Maybe it’s meant to be part of something.

name: radiant-petal
flavor_text_entries:
A single petal that the King of Bountiful Harvests
gave you. It radiates faint light.

name: white-mane-hair
flavor_text_entries:
Mane hair that belonged to the King of Bountiful
Harvests’ beloved steed, Glastrier. The hair is strong
and very flexible.

name: black-mane-hair
flavor_text_entries:
Mane hair that belonged to the King of Bountiful
Harvests’ beloved steed, Spectrier. The hair is very
smooth to the touch.

name: iceroot-carrot
flavor_text_entries:
Produce that the King of Bountiful Harvests’ beloved
steed likes to eat. It grew in a field covered in snow.

name: shaderoot-carrot
flavor_text_entries:
Produce that the King of Bountiful Harvests’ beloved
steed likes to eat. It grew in a gloomy field.

name: dynite-ore
flavor_text_entries:
Mysterious ore that can be obtained in the Max Lair.
Something good will happen if you give it to a
collector in the Crown Tundra.

name: carrot-seeds
flavor_text_entries:
Seeds to plant in a field. The kind of carrot you’ll get is
determined by which field you plant the seeds in.

name: ability-patch
flavor_text_entries:
A patch that allows a Pokémon with a regular Ability
to have a rare Ability.

name: reins-of-unity
flavor_text_entries:
Cords that shine when you hold them up to the light.
The people of old times presented these to the King of
Bountiful Harvests to express their gratitude.

effect_entries.effect: The Linking Cord triggers the evolution of certain Pokémon (all of which can alternatively evolve when traded) upon use. This consumes the Linking Cord.
effect_entries.short_effect: Allows a Pokemon whose evolution is usually triggered by trading to evolve

name: laheavy-ball
flavor_text_entries:
Doesn't fly far, but is more effective if the Pokémon
hasn't noticed the player.

name: laleaden-ball
flavor_text_entries:
Upgraded version of the Heavy Ball. Doesn't fly far,
but is more effective if the Pokémon hasn't noticed the player.

name: lagigaton-ball
flavor_text_entries:
Upgraded version of the Leaden Ball. Doesn't fly far,
but is more effective if the Pokémon hasn't noticed the player.

name: lafeather-ball
flavor_text_entries:
Can be thrown further than a regular Poké Ball.
Is more effective for catching Pokémon that fly high in the air.

name: lawing-ball
flavor_text_entries:
Can be thrown further than a Feather Ball.
Is more effective for catching Pokémon that fly high in the air.

name: lajet-ball
flavor_text_entries:
Can be thrown further than a Wing Ball.
Is more effective for catching Pokémon that fly high in the air.
